articles.title: Kim Jong Un Supervises Ballistic Rocket Launching Drill of Hwasong Artillery Units of KPA Strategic Force
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Supervises Ballistic Rockets Launching Drill of Hwasong Artillery Units of KPA Strategic Force
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), supervised a ballistic rocket launching drill of Hwasong artillery units of the Strategic Force of the KPA on the spot.
					 Involved in the drill were Hwasong artillery units of the KPA Strategic Force tasked to strike the bases of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in Japan in contingency.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un learned in detail about the preparations for fire strike while going round the ballistic rocket launching grounds.
					
					 At an observation post he was briefed on a launching plan and gave an order to start the drill.
					
					 Feasting his eyes on the trails of ballistic rockets, he appreciated that Hwasong artillery units of the Strategic Force are very good at organizing and commanding fire strikes and strictly ensuring rapid and simultaneous fire strikes.
					
					 The four ballistic rockets launched simultaneously are so accurate that they look like acrobatic flying corps in formation, he said.
					
					 Praising once again the Hwasong artillerymen for successfully concluding the drill for launching ballistic rockets simultaneously, he added that it is a great pride of the Party and state, army and people to have such strongest one as the KPA Strategic Force equipped with Korean-style powerful ballistic rockets and Juche-based fire strike methods.
					
					 He gave the officials accompanying him the tasks to be fulfilled to strictly establish a monolithic leadership system and commanding and managing system of the supreme commander over the strategic force, further round off the Juche-based rocket striking methods put on an actual, scientific and modern basis, continuously develop Korean-style ultra-precision and intellectually promoted rockets and bolster them in quality and quantity.
					
					 He ordered the KPA Strategic Force to keep highly alert as required by the grim situation in which an actual war may break out anytime, and get fully ready to promptly move, take positions and strike so that it can open fire to annihilate the enemies once the Party Central Committee issues an order.
					
					 Expressing expectation and belief that the Hwasong artillerymen of the KPA Strategic Force would successfully discharge their sacred mission and duty as creditable nuclear force of the Workers' Party of Korea in the death-defying struggle against the enemies, he had a photo session with them.
					
					 Accompanying him were Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Jong Sik and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee and scientists and technicians in the nuclear weapon and rocket research fields.

articles.title: DPRK FM Temporarily Bans Exit of Malaysians
articles.content:
DPRK FM Temporarily Bans Exit of Malaysians
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Protocol Department of the DPRK Foreign Ministry, at the request of a relevant organ, on Tuesday informed the Malaysian Embassy here of its decision to temporarily ban the exit of Malaysian citizens in the DPRK until the safety of the diplomats and citizens of the DPRK in Malaysia is fully guaranteed through the fair settlement of the case that occurred in Malaysia.
					 It expressed hope that the Malaysian Embassy here and the Foreign Ministry of Malaysia would fairly settle the current case as early as possible from the goodwill stand of setting store by and developing the bilateral relations.
					
					 In this period the diplomats and citizens of Malaysia may work and live normally under the same conditions and circumstances as before.

articles.title: All Out People's Action to Shatter Nuclear War Moves against DPRK Called for
articles.content:
All Out People's Action to Shatter Nuclear War Moves against DPRK Called for
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The north, the south and overseas headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) released a joint statement on March 7 denouncing the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military maneuvers of the U.S. and south Korean military warmongers.
					 The statement said that the U.S. and south Korean warmongers are openly claiming the on-going nuclear war maneuvers are preemptive strike drills for invading the north, throwing away their trite signboard that they are "annual" and "defensive" in a bid to fool the public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 The statement branded the madcap joint saber-rattling as a blatant challenge to the desire of the nation for the peace of the country, improved north-south relations and independent reunification and as unpardonable war provocation to violate the sovereignty of the Korean nation and bring a nuclear disaster to Korea. 
					
					 Pomminryon will never tolerate the U.S. and its vassal forces' criminal scenario to bring the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over this inviolable land but take the lead in the courageous nationwide struggle for checking it as declared before the nation at the recent 17th meeting of its co-chairmen, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 Pomminryon will conduct a more dynamic nationwide struggle for forcing the U.S. troops out of south Korea at the earliest possible date with a view to eliminating the root cause of war from the Korean peninsula and building a lasting and solid peace-keeping mechanism by firmly joining hands with the people from all walks of life at home and abroad.
					
					 Pomminryon will sternly judge the conservative ruling forces of south Korea making desperate efforts to seek a way out in confrontation with fellow countrymen and war, backed by the U.S., the sworn enemy and principal enemy of the nation, and definitely usher in the second June 15 era of reunification pervaded with the atmosphere of national reconciliation, unity and reunification, freed from a war.
					
					 The statement appealed to all Koreans at home and abroad to turn out in the struggle for smashing the reckless nuclear war moves of the U.S. and its vassal forces and opening up a new phase of the peace of the country, improved north-south relations and independent reunification this year.

articles.title: 2016 Socialist Emulation in Fishery Reviewed
articles.content:
2016 Socialist Emulation in Fishery Reviewed
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the Central Hall of Workers on Tuesday to review the socialist emulation in the field of fishery in Juche 105 (2016).
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affaires Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Vice-Premier Ri Ryong Nam, officials concerned, officials of the provincial party and power bodies and committees of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK), officials of those units which took part in the emulation and fishermen.
					
					 Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the GFTUK, made a report.
					
					 He called upon all the officials and working people to make positive contribution to bringing earlier the building of a socialist power by making big fish hauls this year of key importance in the work for implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					
					 Standings in the emulation were made public, citations in the joint name of the C.C., WPK and the DPRK Cabinet and rotating silk banner of the socialist emulation were awarded to the Kim Chaek Fishery Station, the Tupho Fishery Station for Providing Dolphin Food, the Jongju Fishery Station and the Kyolsong Small-scale Fishing Station.
					
					 The outline for the socialist emulation in the field of fishery for Juche 106 (2017) was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Pyongyangites Meet
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Meet
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Pyongyangites met at Kim Il Sung Square on Tuesday to respond to the appeal the creators of the Spirit of Kangwon Province sent to the working people across the country. 
					 Attending the meeting were officials of commissions, ministries and national institutions and party and power organs, working people's organizations, institutions, industrial establishments, co-op farms and universities in the city of Pyongyang and citizens from all walks of life.
					
					 Read out there was an appeal to all the working people across the country sent by the creators of the Spirit of Kangwon Province.
					
					 Then followed speeches of representatives of the officials, working class, agricultural workers and intellectuals.
					
					 Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, underscored the need to model after the spirit of Kangwon Province and absolutely trust and follow respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un only with gem-like loyalty and conduct a dynamic struggle to carry out the behests of the great leaders and defend the Party's policies.
					
					 Kim Myong Hwan, manager of Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill, vowed to build up its own technical force and conduct a brisk mass technological innovation movement so as to update the production processes and equipment at a high level and thus turn the mill into a labor force-saving one.
					
					 Pang Kum Ok, chairwoman of the Management Board of the Tongsan Co-op Farm in Sunan District, said that the agricultural front is a major thrust in the building of an economic power and an outpost for defending socialism, adding that her farm would again achieve a signal boost in the grain production by doing this year's farming successfully.
					
					 Kim Ho, dean of a faculty of Kim Chaek University of Technology, said that they would register valuable latest science and technology achievements, smoothly settle the scientific and technological issues arising in developing the economy and improving the standard of people's living and thus contribute to strengthening the independence and Juche character of the economy.
					
					 Then followed a public procession.

articles.title: Folk and Amusement Games Mark March 8 International Women's Day
articles.content:
Folk and Amusement Games Mark March 8 International Women's Day
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Folk and amusement games of officials and members of the women's union across the country took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on March 6 and 7 to mark the March 8 International Women's Day.
					 The games brought together more than 270 women selected in Pyongyang city and each province. 
					
					 They competed in such events as putting ball into ring, rope-skipping, seesaw and yut game.
					
					 Pyongyang City placed first in team standing.

articles.title: Success Made in Home-Production of Vegetable Insecticide
articles.content:
Success Made in Home-Production of Vegetable Insecticide
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Plant Protective Institute of the Institute of Agricultural Science under the Ministry of Agriculture recently succeeded in home-production of a new vegetable insecticide.
					 A research group of the institute adopted a new method of analyzing the percentage of nicotine in an oily medicine to produce the insecticide by combustion.
					
					 It has been proved through application that the insecticide is efficacious against over 10 species of harmful insects and its rate of exterminating harmful insects from roadside trees reached over 95 percent. 
					
					 It is low in production cost and its production process needs less power consumption.
					
					 Now, the Ministry of Agriculture is pushing ahead with a project to set up its production bases in different parts of the country.

articles.title: Many Foodstuffs for Children Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
Many Foodstuffs for Children Produced in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Many kinds of foodstuffs for children have been produced in the DPRK, enjoying great popularity. 
					Among them are baby powder, nutritious rice powder, soya milk and soya yoghurt produced by the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory.
					
					What is most popular is baby powder, of which main ingredients are nearly the same as those of mother's milk.
					
					And the rice powder abounds in nutritive components good for the growth of children.
					
					The factory introduced a technology of raising the sterilizing effectiveness into the production of soya milk to better its flavor and improved the quality of soya yoghurt with a new lactobacillus.
					
					Recently, the factory developed and began producing various products like soya milk powders with different fruit flavors and thin gruel.

articles.title: DPRK's Measures to Bolster Nuclear Force for Self-Defense Will Go on: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK's Measures to Bolster Nuclear Force for Self-Defense Will Go on: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. hegemonic scenario to dominate the world with strategic nuclear edge is being steadily disclosed.
					 In the middle of February, the U.S. test-fired submarine-launched ballistic missile "Trident-2 D-5" capable of carrying Mt-class nuclear warheads in the Pacific.
					
					 And it is stepping up the modernization of nuclear weapons as evidenced by the entry into the practical phase of replacing Ohio-class strategic nuclear submarines, which play an important role in carrying out the U.S. policy of nuclear blackmail, with more powerful Colombia-class nuclear submarines. 
					
					 The present chief executive of the U.S., when interviewed by foreign media on Feb. 23, asserted that the U.S. nuclear force is left behind other countries, underscoring the need to bolster up its nuclear force in a bid to keep a dominating position in the military muscle.
					
					 On Feb. 27, he proposed a 10 percent increase in military spending for the next fiscal year over that in the previous fiscal year. 
					
					 This is no more than nuclear confrontational hysteria to dominate the world with an unchallenged nuclear edge.
					
					 No matter how often the U.S. may claim that it is left behind other countries and it is not making muscle flexing before the world, it cannot cover up its scenario to modernize nuclear weapons.
					
					 It is the U.S. which has the biggest stockpile of latest nuclear weapons and is pushing forward the state strategy of dominating the world with them as its mainstay.
					
					 The successive U.S. rulers have persistently resorted to the moves to monopolize nuclear weapons to dominate mankind under the deceptive signboard of "nuclear disarmament" and "world free from nuclear weapons".
					
					 Even at this moment the U.S. is invariably pushing forward the project for modernizing nuclear weapons requiring one trillion U.S. dollars which had been pressed forward by the previous administration under the motto of "peace backed by force of arms." There are assertions calling for the repeal of treaties on the reduction of nuclear weapons signed with other big powers.
					
					 The U.S. is the biggest nuclear weapons state and a nuclear criminal state which inflicted the first nuclear disaster on mankind. Therefore, its undisguised ambition of hegemony and moves to modernize nuclear weapons would only increase the danger of a nuclear war and nuclear arms race on our planet.
					
					 Under the situation where the U.S. stage nuclear war drills against the DPRK in south Korea and its vicinity every year and watch for a chance of making a preemptive nuclear attack, it is quite unreasonable for the DPRK to scrap nuclear weapons.
					
					 Under the present international situation where the U.S. and its vassal forces' policy of nuclear threat and blackmail persist, the DPRK will bolster up military capability for self-defense with nuclear force as pivot and ability of making a preemptive attack in order to preserve the country's sovereignty and the nation's right to existence.
					
					 The DPRK's measures to bolster up the nuclear force for self-defense will go on until the nuclear weapons are eliminated from the earth.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms S. Korean Authorities Modern-day Traitors
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms S. Korean Authorities Modern-day Traitors
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries' moves to nullify the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and the south Korean authorities' humiliating act of conniving at them triggered off towering indignation among the Koreans.
					 Since the outset of the new year the Japanese reactionaries have pressurized the south Korean authorities to implement the "agreement on the sexual slavery issue", threatening that Japan can neither send back the Japanese ambassador and consul general to south Korea nor can it expect the normalization of the bilateral relations unless the girl statues depicting a sexual slave for the Imperial Japanese Army standing before the Japanese embassy in Seoul and the consulate general in Pusan are removed.
					
					 Shortly ago, the Japanese foreign minister went so arrogant as telling the south Korean puppet foreign minister abroad that the project for erecting a girl statue on Tok Islets is "intolerable", urging him to take a proper step and warning him that what is important is result.
					
					 Japan, which committed the shuddering crimes against humanity by taking 200 000 Korean women to battle fields after kidnapping them, is now trying to check the campaign for erecting girl statues sweeping south Korea and raise a claim to Tok Islets. This is a gangster-like logic and the height of impudence.
					
					 The girl statues are not just simple sculptures but they are symbolic of all Koreans' indignation at the Japanese imperialists who committed unspeakable crimes against the Korean nation and their will to take a thousand-fold revenge on the Japs of the island nation.
					
					 The Korean nation's unanimous bad blood towards Japan, the sworn enemy of the nation, can never change no matter how many times a generation is replaced by another.
					
					 However, the south Korean puppet authorities granted the Japanese imperialists impunity for their past crimes and, not content with this, are going all the more crazy for serving Japan, yielding to its brigandish demand.
					
					 Foreign Minister Yun Pyong Se and other traitors slavishly promised the Japanese reactionaries to "respect the agreement on the sexual slavery and honor it" and went the lengths of sending informal notice to the local self-governing bodies calling on them to remove the girl statues.
					
					 They even let the pro-Japanese organizations paste posters reading "Until when Japan has to be hated" and "Japan should be pardoned" in places around girl statues and hurled police into investigating or putting  in custody members of civic organization active to protect the statues.
					
					 As these traitors ride roughshod in south Korea, the Japanese reactionaries still assert impudently that "they have no intent to apologize" for the sexual slavery issue and "once money is received, the girl statue has to be removed."
					
					 Now the opposition parties and all social circles of south Korea strongly denounce the puppet authorities as modern-day "five traitors of 1905" who are no longer members of the nation as they behave in such a humiliating manner after receiving just 1 billion yen less than the price for race horses for Jong Yu Ra, daughter of Choe Sun Sil.
					
					 The nation can never escape shame and disaster as long as the group of traitors prolonging their remaining days through hideous sycophancy toward Japan is allowed to go at large.
					
					 All Koreans will certainly force Japan and the group of traitors to pay dearly for all their criminal acts.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Sneers at Solitary Traitor Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Sneers at Solitary Traitor Park Geun Hye 
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Now traitor Park Geun Hye who is about to face impeachment trial soon is in solitary position as she is snubbed by all with all her aides getting away from her.
					 Even the U.S. regards her impeachment as an established fact and spreads the opinion through media that it is not needed to delay her resignation, driving her further into a tight corner.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 All the puppet ruling quarters of south Korea who resorted to treachery met miserable ends. However, no one faced such a tragic end in solitary position like poor Park.
					
					 It is disgrace of south Korean people and shame of the nation before the world that such human scum and matchless fool has stayed in Chongwadae as "president".
					
					 This is the due punishment meted out to Park who has pursued dictatorial rule while reigning over the people, committed unpardonable crimes of corruption and escalated confrontation with the compatriots since she took office.
					
					 Witnessing her disgraceful end, all the Koreans draw a historic lesson that if an evil takes the power, the people will suffer misfortune and the nation experience pain.
					
					 Now the Park Geun Hye group of traitors makes desperate efforts to avoid the final trial, but with no plot can it evade the stern punishment by the people.
					
					 Anyone in south Korea who follows in the footsteps of Park Geun Hye will meet the same fate as hers.

articles.title: DPRK Will Respond to U.S. Imperialists' Nuclear War Racket with Toughest Counteraction: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Respond to U.S. Imperialists' Nuclear War Racket with Toughest Counteraction: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. together with the south Korean puppet forces kicked off the largest-ever Foal Eagle joint military drills from March 1, despite unanimous opposition of the Korean people at home and abroad. 
					 The U.S., with the veil of annual and defensive drills taken off, asserts that the drills are aimed to make a preemptive attack upon the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 This goes to prove that the war maniacs' moves to ignite a nuclear war have reached the very dangerous phase.
					
					 It is no more than a daydream to stifle the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 The U.S. are well advised to clearly understand the DPRK's war deterrent that has been built for decades in order to put a definite end to the stand-off between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK solemnly declared at home and abroad its steadfast stand to firmly defend peace on the Korean peninsula and in other parts of the world in reliance on the war deterrent for self-defense.
					
					 The Korean People's Army has long put within the range of its precision strike the air force base on Guam where nuclear strategic bombers take off, the oversea aggressive bases where nuclear-powered submarines are launched and other U.S. logistic bases for aggression against the DPRK, and even the U.S. mainland.
					
					 The U.S. evermore desperate nuclear saber-rattling on the peninsula will bring it merciless nuclear barrage of fire and final doom.
					
					 Only prudence and self-control are the way for the U.S. to escape from its miserable fate.
					
					 If a spark of the war drills violates the DPRK's inviolable territory, sea and sky even a bit, the U.S. would be followed by the merciless retaliatory counteraction of the infuriated army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Prevailing Situation Requires Bolstering of Nuclear Deterrence: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Prevailing Situation Requires Bolstering of Nuclear Deterrence: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- For the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear force provides a way of guaranteeing peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the region and protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation and socialism. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in an article. It goes on:
					 Big powers seek to expand the sphere of their influence with emphasis on their politics, economy and diplomacy towards Asia-Pacific.
					
					 What is noticeable in this respect is the U.S. arms buildup and military moves.
					
					 These frantic moves of the U.S. are arousing due vigilance among the regional countries.
					
					 However, the U.S. is letting out such rhetoric as that "intolerable is the attempt to change international order" and "it is necessary to modernize the U.S. forces and bolster up troops and weapons and equipment," touting "threat" from someone.
					
					 No one has ever asked the U.S. to preserve regional order nor requested to defend peace in the region.
					
					 The U.S. is mulling using even such vassal forces as Japan for carrying out its strategy though the latter is keen on meeting its interests in the Asia-Pacific region with the help of big powers.
					
					 The U.S. regards it as its primary strategic target to occupy the DPRK out of calculation that only when the former puts the whole of the  Korean peninsula under its control can it dominate Northeast Asia and, furthermore, the rest of the world.
					
					 Peace on the Korean peninsula is directly linked to peace in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world. Once a war breaks out on the peninsula, it will naturally spill over into neighboring countries and lead to a global nuclear war.
					
					 The prevailing situation requires the DPRK to put spurs to bolstering up its war deterrence.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Harassing World Peace
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Harassing World Peace
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. topped the world list of arms export over the past five years, according to data released by the Stockholm international peace institute. To be more specific, the U.S. sold off its weapons to Mideast and Asia en masse. It was reported that countries in these regions vied with each other to order and buy American weapons to tackle regional disputes.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says: 
					
					 This clearly suggests the aim lurking behind the U.S. strategy toward Mideast and Asia.
					
					 This more clearly explains the reason why the U.S. is taking so much pain to intervene in the Mideast disputes and disturb peace and stability in Asia-Pacific. Its ulterior intention is to bring greater profits to its munitions monopolies.
					
					 This is the reason why the U.S. is working hard to deliberately escalate the tension in the world's various hotpots including the Korean peninsula, challenging the human desire for peace.
					
					 The cycle of tension that repeats on the peninsula every year is not exception.
					
					 By deliberately creating "security crisis" on the Korean peninsula in a bid to prompt the south Korean puppets to require more arms, the U.S. seeks to sell greater quantities of war hardware to them and thus bring enormous profits to its munitions monopolies.
					
					 It goes without saying that the weapons and equipment which the U.S. sold to various countries of the world including south Korea would be a catalyst of arms race and lethal weapons for escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen and killing them.
					
					 This goes to prove that the U.S. is a criminal state which stoops to any dangerous act of harassing world peace and security and throwing humankind into destruction in order to serve its selfish purpose.

articles.title: Minju Joson Brands Hwang Kyo An as Traitor
articles.content:
Minju Joson Brands Hwang Kyo An as Traitor
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Days ago traitor Hwang Kyo An, puppet acting president of south Korea, in his "March 1 memorial address" spit out vitriol inciting confrontation with the compatriots and treacherous remarks taking issue with the DPRK.
					 His reckless remarks are infamies of a psychopath frightened by the nuclear might of the DPRK and of traitor obsessed with sycophancy toward the U.S. and Japan, Minju Joson Tuesday says in a commentary. 
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Hwang viciously slandered the DPRK's measure of bolstering up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence, talking about "strong joint defensive posture" with the U.S. and "tightening sanctions and pressure". This only revealed his nature as a confrontation maniac putting traitor Park Geun Hye into the shade.
					
					 He groundlessly hurt the DPRK over "people's living" and "human rights" and called for a "substantial change of the north" and "equal member nation". These are utterly ridiculous and senseless.
					
					 He stressed the need to "respect and implement" the purport and spirit of the "agreement" on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, expressing the will to "further boost cooperation" with Japan to cope with the "nuclear and missile threats from the north" only to spark off surging indignation of the nation.
					
					 Hwang Kyo An is the very despicable maniac keen on escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen and the traitor who should be eliminated as early as possible.
					
					 With no rhetoric can Hwang cover up the hideous crimes he committed together with Park Geun Hye and deny the candlelight action of the angry people demanding his impeachment and detention.

articles.title: U.S. War Moves Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. War Moves Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Pusan Civil Rights Solidarity of south Korea held a rally with citizens of different social standings at Pusan Port on March 5 in demand of halt to the U.S. imperialists' war exercises, the cancellation of planned THAAD deployment and dismantlement of labs for bio-chemical weapons, according to the south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo.
					 At the rally speakers contended that the moves to form the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance and the joint military drills escalating the military tension on the Korean peninsula and creating the danger of south-north conflict should be stopped at once. 
					
					 They expressed the will to steadily wage the struggle to stop the operation of the bio-chemical weapons labs and dismantle them in solidarity with organizations desirous of peace and security.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Seminars on exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in the Czech Republic, France, Sri Lanka, Egypt and DR Congo between February 6 and 12 on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, his birth anniversary.
					 Displayed at the venues of the seminars were photos dealing with Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits and photos dealing with revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Josef Servista, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party and vice-chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, said that Kim Jong Il was the eternal leader of the Korean people who defended socialism and the gains of revolution and laid the firm foundation for building a socialist power.
					
					 Guy Dupre, president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, praised Kim Jong Il as the steadfast defender of the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation and the lodestar of national reunification who clearly indicated its path.
					
					 W. A. Duminduwardane, chairman of the Sri Lanka Society for Self-Reliance Studies, said that Kim Jong Il bolstered up the military capability of the country in every way with his energetic Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il for devoting all his life to the country and nation and the prosperity of the generations to come.
					
					 Andre Lohekele Kalonda, chairman of the DR Congo National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, said that Kim Jong Il's greatest exploit was that he turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in DR Congo.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed by Russian Newspapers
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed by Russian Newspapers
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) illustrated with his portraits of smiling image and photos.
					 The 6th issue of Zavtra said in an article titled "Brilliant commander in 21st century" that Kim Jong Il who was born and grew up in Mt Paektu, hearing gunfire during the great anti-Japanese war, cultivated the wisdom and courage as a brilliant commander beside a table for operational plans at the supreme command during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The February 8th issue of Nakhodkinski Rabochi in an article praised Kim Jong Il for leaving the trace of love and devotion for the people across the country.
					
					 The February 14th issue of Spassk an article titled "Eternal Songun sun" said the feats performed by him in his lifetime will shine forever as the most precious heritage guaranteeing the victorious advance of the socialist cause and the human cause of independence.
					
					 Komsomolskaya Pravda in an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il, eternal leader of DPRK" noted that his birth was an event of great significance in the destiny and development of not only the Korean people but also the progressive mankind of the world.
					
					 The 6th issue of Za Narodnuyu Blastsi carried an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il is in Novosibirsk" introducing in detail the trace he left in the city of Novosibirsk when he paid a historic visit to the Russian Federation in the first year of the new century.
					
					 The February issue of Serp I Molot said that Kim Jong Il devoted all his life to the happiness of the people and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige el entrenamiento de disparo de cohetes balisticos de las unidades Hwasong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige el entrenamiento de disparo de cohetes balisticos de las unidades Hwasong
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el entrenamiento de disparo de cohetes balisticos de las unidades artilleras Hwasong de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC. 
					Tomaron parte en el entrenamiento las unidades que se encargan de la mision de golpear en tiempo de emergencia a las bases de tropas agresoras norteamericanas estacionadas en Japon.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente recorrio los campos de lanzamiento averiguando el estado de preparacion del ejercicio y subio al puesto de vigilancia donde se informo del plan de ejercicios y dio la orden de iniciar en entrenamiento.
					
					Contemplando el vapor de los cohetes lanzados, dijo que las unidades realizan con destreza la organizacion y el mando de golpe con fuegos y aseguran estrictamente la prontitud y la unanimidad del golpe. Aprecio mucho la precision de los proyectiles diciendo que los 4 cohetes despegados al mismo tiempo vuelan con la figura misma como si una aviacion acrobatica hiciera un vuelo en formacion. 
					
					Elogiando reiteradamente a los artilleros quienes efectuaron con exito el presente lanzamiento simultaneo, el Maximo Dirigente subrayo que el gran orgullo del partido y el Estado, el ejercito y el pueblo lo es tener las fuerzas armadas estrategicas de flor y nata como las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC equipadas con los poderoso cohetes balisticos fabricados con nuestra propia cuenta y armadas con los autentico metodos de golpe de fuegos. 
					
					A los funcionarios acompanados presento las tareas que se presentan en establecer firmemente el sistema de la direccion unica y el de mando y administracion unicos del Comandante Supremo sobre las fuerzas armadas estrategicas, perfeccionar mas el autoctono metodo de golpe de cohetes que tiene como lo principal el entrenamiento en el ambiente de combate real, la cientifizacion y la modernizacion, desarrollar sin cesar y consolidar cuantitativa-cualitativamente los cohetes superpreciso e inteligentes. 
					
					Ordeno a las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC mantener el estado de alerta conforme a la situacion tirante, que puede convertirse en cualquier momento en la batalla real, y hacer toda la preparacion para el movimiento, la posicion, el estado tecnico y el golpe para disparar de inmediato si se da la orden del Comite Central del PTC. 
					
					Expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que los artilleros de las unidades Hwasong de las Fuerzas Estrategicas del EPC cumpliran perfectamente su sagrada mision y deber de las fidedignas fuerzas armadas nucleares del PTC en la batalla decisiva contra los enemigos y se fotografio junto a ellos. 
					
					Le acompanaron Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Jong Sik y otros cuadros responsables del Comite Central del PTC, los cientificos y tecnicos de los sectores de investigacion de las armas nucleares y los cohetes.

articles.title: Direccion de Protocolo del MINREX avisa la decision de no permitir temporalmente la salida de malasios
articles.content:
Direccion de Protocolo del MINREX avisa la decision de no permitir temporalmente la salida de malasios
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ACNC) -- A instancia de un organo correspondiente, la Direccion de Protocolo del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea aviso el dia 7 a la embajada de Malasia en Corea la decision de no permitir temporalmente la salida de los ciudadanos malasios en la RPDC hasta que se de la perfecta garantia de seguridad de los diplomaticos y ciudadanos de la RPDC en Malasia al resolverse imparcialmente el incidente recien ocurrido en ese pais. Al mismo tiempo, expreso la esperanza de que la embajada de Malasia en Corea y el MINREX del mismo pais resuelvan pronta e imparcialmente el presente incidente desde la posicion de buena fe de apreciar y desarrollar las relaciones bilaterales. 
					En ese tiempo, los diplomaticos de la embajada de Malasia y los ciudadanos malasios en la RPDC trabajaran y viviran normalmente en las mismas condiciones y circunstancias que antes.

articles.title: Efectuado el mitin multitudinario de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Efectuado el mitin multitudinario de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin multitudinario de la ciudad de Pyongyang en respuesta al llamamiento de los creadores del Espiritu de la Provincia de Kangwon enviado a todos los trabajadores del pais. 
					Participaron a la cita los funcionarios de los comites, ministerios, organos centrales, organismos del Partido y el Poder, entidades de masas, instituciones, fabricas, empresas, granjas y universidades de la capital y los trabajadores de diferentes estratos. 
					
					En la ocasion se dio lectura al llamamiento enviado por los creadores del Espiritu de la Provincia de Kangwon.
					
					Luego, hubo intervenciones de juramento de los representantes de funcionarios, obreros, trabajadores agricolas e intelectuales.
					
					El presidente del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Cha Hui Rim expuso la decision de confiar y apoyar absolutamente solo al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y dinamizar la campana de materializacion de los legados de lideres antecesores y la de defensa de las politicas del Partido, aprendiendo el Espiritu de la Provincia de Kangwon.
					
					El gerente de la Hilanderia Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang, Kim Myong Hwan, destaco que acondicionara las fuerzas tecnicas propias y dinamizara el movimiento masivo de renovacion tecnica para asi lograr en alto nivel la modernizacion de los procesos productivos e instalaciones y convertir la fabrica en la de ahorro de la mano de obra. 
					
					La presidenta de la Junta Administrativa de la Granja Cooperativa de Tongsan del municipio de Sun-an, Pang Kum Ok, dijo que el frente agricola es la linea avanzada de la construccion de potencia economica y de la batalla de defensa del socialismo y manifesto la decision de recoger una buena cosecha en la produccion cerealera de este ano. 
					
					El jefe de facultad de la Universidad Tecnica Kim Chaek, Kim Ho expreso la decision de lograr mucho mas exitos de ciencias y tecnicas sofisticadas y productos de tecnologia de punta hechos con recursos nacionales y resolver satisfactoriamente los problemas cientifico-tecnicos que se presentan en el desarrollo de economia y la mejora de vida del pueblo para asi elevar el caracter autarquico e independiente de la economia. 
					
					Acto seguido, hubo una manifestacion multitudinaria.

articles.title: Tienen lugar juegos recreativos por el Dia Internacional de la Mujer
articles.content:
Tienen lugar juegos recreativos por el Dia Internacional de la Mujer
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar los dias 6 y 7 en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang los juegos recreativos folcloricos de las funcionarias e integrantes de la Union Socialista de Mujeres de Corea en homenaje al Dia Internacional de la Mujer.
					  En esta competencia compitieron mas de 270 jugadoras seleccionadas de la capital y las provincias.
					
					Los juegos se realizaron bajo el entusiasmo elevado de las jugadoras e hinchas. 
					
					La ciudad de Pyongyang ocupo el primer lugar en la clasificacion general.
